name: Something Looks Weird
description:
"You were sleeping on a train after a night of trying your best not to look weird, and then you wake up to find yourself in a strange room. Unsure of what to do, you start to look around..."

This is the sequel to Don't Look Weird, Something Looks Weird! It's a game I worked on, on and off for about a year. It's definitely a lot more surreal then DLW, so expect to see some weird stuff. 

The OST from magicdweedoo can be found here: https://dweedes.bandcamp.com/album/something-looks-weird-ost

It takes about 10 - 20 minutes to complete, and has some light puzzles in it. I made it with HTML in mind, but there's also a exe you can download if you prefer that.

Additionally, there is now a walk through txt if you get stuck! It's all the answers too, so, make sure you really don't know what to do
